name: Conqueror (itch) (l u h o v e i)
name_original: Conqueror (itch) (l u h o v e i)
description:
Idle incremental game prototype. Construct machines, watch the numbers go up. Construct additional machines, the numbers go up even faster now.

Save game does not work, not even implemented.

No sound either.

Update: improved Dungeon Unlock window to display information about unlock chance based on the amount of Golems spent.
developers: l u h o v e i
